column4: I'm new to ubuntu on servers, and I'm running 8.10 now... I'm used to using /etc/inittab to maintain a mission-critical process (asterisk), but in ubuntu I guess it uses upstart.

I found this: http://blog.mypapit.net/2007/03/where-can-i-find-inittab-in-ubuntu-edgy-eft-or-feisty-fawn.html, and I copied /etc/event.d/tty6 to /etc/event.d/ast, and used it as a template for making one for asterisk, but telinit q didn't start asterisk
nothing in the logs, any ideas?
um, did you install asterisk through the repositories?
